    Creates objects using reflection and the specified configuration values.

    package Aura.Di

     Methods

    When cloning this Forge, create a separate Config object for the clone.

    __clone() : void

    Constructor.

    __construct(Aura\Di\ConfigInterface $config) 

    Parameters

    $config

    \Aura\Di\ConfigInterface

    A configuration object.

    Gets the injected Config object.

    getConfig() : \Aura\Di\ConfigInterface

    Returns

    \Aura\Di\ConfigInterface

    Creates and returns a new instance of a class using reflection and the configuration parameters, optionally with overriding params.

    newInstance(string $class, array $params, array $setters) : object

    Parameters that are Lazy are invoked before instantiation.

    Parameters

    $class

    string

    The class to instantiate.

    $params

    array

    An associative array of override parameters where the key is the name of the constructor parameter and the value is the parameter value to use.

    $setters

    array

    An associative array of override setters where the key is the name of the setter method to call and the value is the value to be passed to the setter method.

    Returns

    object

     Properties

     

    A Config object to get parameters for object instantiation and \ReflectionClass instances.
